Title: Host Profiles
Description:
Host Profiles is small tool to control, switch and management the hosts file of the computer.
The hosts file is located in "c:\windows\system32\drivers\etc\hosts".
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Host Profiles is a cross platofrm host file management tool. Quickly switch host profiles and flush dns automatically. 
 

Requirement:

  • Windows: 
    • .Net framework 2.0 and upper.
  • Linux: 
    • Mono 1.2 and upper
    • root access
    • nscd Service
    • ifconfig commmand

Linux help

  • Ubuntu 10.0 Tested


Currently, only root user can launch the program.
Please launch the program like this:
sudo mono HostProfiles.exe

Screen Shot

  • Ubuntu 10.0
